New Records: Lockie Ferguson became the first bowler at a World Cup to bowl four maidens
Key Match Events: PNG lost early wickets to fall to 14-2, bowled out for 78
New Zealand made one change; wrist spinner Ish Sodhi came in for bowling allrounder James Neesham
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams were already eliminated from Super Eight contention in Group C
New Zealand lost to Afghanistan and the West Indies and has beaten only Uganda
PNG has yet to win a game
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections were mentioned in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delayed the toss by an hour, and no overs were lost
New Zealand made one change; wrist spinner Ish Sodhi came in for bowling allrounder James Neesham
